original_title: US-led mediators ‘appalled’ by humanitarian crisis in war-torn Sudan | Sudan war News | Al Jazeera
article_summary: "International mediators, including the US, Egypt, Saudi Arabia, and UAE, express concern over the worsening humanitarian crisis in Sudan, where a three-year civil war has left 25 million people facing dire hunger. The mediators, known as the Aligned for Advancing Lifesaving and Peace in Sudan (ALPS) Group, urge immediate action to protect civilians and ensure humanitarian access, particularly in North Darfur and Kordofan regions."</s>
